name: YSFLIGHT Mission File
summary: Learn about .YFS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Several YFS files are included with the YSFLIGHT installation within the /​missions/​ directory. Custom missions can be created using the YSFLIGHT Scenery Editor.

description: Game file used by YSFLIGHT, a free, cross-platform flight simulation game; stored in plain text and contains properties for mission obstacles and objectives; can specify enemy aircraft, starting positions, weather conditions, and other factors.
